parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Computes the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euclidean_distance#Squared_Euclidean_distance squared distance] between two objects or positions. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> var1 '''distanceSqr''' var2 </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> var1: [[Object]] or [[Position]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> var2: [[Object]] or [[Position]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] Distance in meters or 1e10 if distance cannot be calculated </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[distanceSqr]] ([[leader]] [[player]])</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_distance = [[sqrt]] ((x2 - x1) ^ 2 + (y2 - y1) ^ 2 + (z2 - z1) ^ 2);
_distanceSqr = (x2 - x1) ^ 2 + (y2 - y1) ^ 2 + (z2 - z1) ^ 2;
_distance = [x1, y1, z1] [[distance]] [x2, y2, z2];
_distanceSqr = [x1, y1, z1] [[distanceSqr]] [x2, y2, z2];
_distance = [[sqrt]] ([x1, y1, z1] [[distanceSqr]] [x2, y2, z2]);
_distanceSqr = ([x1, y1, z1] [[distance]] [x2, y2, z2]) ^ 2;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

If normal distance is calculated according to this formula:


squared distance is calculated according to this formula:  

[[distanceSqr]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[distance]], [[vectorDistanceSqr]], [[distance2D]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
